attributes.action: Make safe storage of motor vehicles a legal requirement.
attributes.additional_details:
It is a legal requirement to store firearms securely when not in use, yet motor vehicles can legally be left in the street unlocked.

I propose that a safe keeping condition (similar to that  applying to firearms) be introduced, requiring that "This motor vehicle must, at all times when not in actual use, be kept secured, with a view to preventing access to it, by persons not authorised to drive it".
